channel.title: 562 RS2HD Bank

item.title: 562 RS2HD Bank
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Does anyone possibly know how to check if a player has an item in their bank and if they do, then remove it. Something like: if(player.getBank().contains(i)){ player.getBank().deleteItem(i, 2147000000); }
But not sure what it is.

Read full topic
